type: Grounds Maintenance Services and/or Snow Clearing and Removal Services
short_summary: Description supplmentaire et/ou de deneigement  de services aux destinataires des                   de la GRC en                    de l/Alberta.
description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police, Desmarais Detachment in Wabasca-Desmarais, Alberta, has a requirement for the Supply and Delivery of Grounds Maintenance Services and Snow Clearing and Snow Removal Services at the RCMP Desmarais Detachment in Wabasca-Desmarais, Alberta.
